Question
========
What is NOT an assumption required for inferential statistics based on simple linear regression?

Answerlist
----------
* The standard error of the estimate is equal for all values of the independent variable.
* The association between the independent and dependent variable is a linear relationship.
* The analyses are based on a randomly selected sample.
* The independent variable is normally distributed.
